# btc_trend_strategy

## Intro
: binance future trading  
: BTCUSDT Only, trend strategy  

## backtest result
: (period) Recent 3-Years  
: (ror-month) avg-monyhly 7%, max:19%, min:-5%(only 1-month in 36-months)  
: (ror-cumulative) 1000% (3-year)  
: (mdd-month) -92%
